data.name: MidBoss Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
MidBoss is a possession-based traditional turn-based roguelike with a retro aesthetic reminiscent of the 16-bit era, and the soundtrack compliments this aesthetic.

Composer yuzuki created two versions of many of the game's tracks in order to accommodate the game's dynamic music system; one upbeat and one low-key version. The soundtrack comes with 16 tracks, some with ethnic, tribal, and folk influences, others touching violin pieces or shredding electric guitars.

Track list


  • 01 - imp's lament
  • 02 - artful
  • 03 - ponderous
  • 04 - inquisitive
  • 05 - impertinent
  • 06 - audacious
  • 07 - undaunted
  • 08 - veracity
  • 09 - vainglory
  • 10 - harbinger
  • 11 - augury
  • 12 - providence
  • 13 - provenance
  • 14 - succession
  • 15 - inexorable
  • 16 - denouement

All tracks are available in FLAC and MP3 formats.

The soundtrack's files can be found in a subdirectory of your MidBoss Steam directory:
Steam\steamapps\common\MidBoss\MidBoss Original Soundtrack

data.short_description: The official soundtrack for MidBoss: the possession based roguelike. Composed by yuzuki.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: FLAC/MP3 playback capable
